--- ex6.1.1.go
x + y =  10
x - y =  4
x * y =  21
x / y =  2
x % y =  1
s * t =  15.700001
s / t =  0.628
--- ex6.1.2.go
^34 =   -35,	 11011101
^34 =   -35,	 1111111111011101
^34 =   221,	 11011101
^34 = 65501,	 1111111111011101
--- ex6.1.3.go
x:00000100 x<<2: 00010000 x<<2: 16
y:01000000 y<<2: 00000000 y<<2: 0
--- ex6.1.4.go
x:00010000 x>>2: 00000100 x>>2: 4
x:10000000 y>>2: 11100000 y>>2: -32
x:11111111 z>>2: 11111111 z>>2: -1
x:10000000 w>>2: 00100000 w>>2: 32
--- ex6.2.1.go
127 < 127 + 1: false
x	=  127, 01111111
x + 1	= -128, -10000000
x + 2	= -127, -1111111
x + 3	= -126, -1111110
-128 > -128 - 1: false
y	= -128, -10000000
y - 1	=  127, 01111111
--- ex6.2.3.go
0.100000 + 0.200000 == 0.300000 : false
0.30000000000000004
--- ex6.3.1.go
0.100000000000000006 + 0.200000000000000011 == 0.300000000000000044
0.299999999999999989 == 0.300000000000000044 : true
7e-13 == 6.000000000000001e-13 : true
--- ex6.3.2.go
0.100000000000000006 + 0.200000000000000011 == 0.300000000000000044
0.299999999999999989 == 0.300000000000000044 : true
7e-13 == 6.000000000000001e-13 : false
--- ex6.3.2-1.go
0.1 0.2 0.3 0.3
0
--- ex6.5.1.go
20 10
--- ex6.6.go
false
